Orpat OEI 187 1200-Watt Dry Iron (White and Blue)

In the fast life of the present generation ironing clothes at home is sadly considered to be a daunting task. We, at eveready, second this notion and showcase in our collection an extremely user friendly electric iron which makes ironing clothes at home very easy. Its ingenious design, be it its comfortable grip or easily manageable swivel cord, allows the consumers to not just use it with ease but also serves its purpose to the very best, providing you with neatly ironed linen and fabrics.

Product Details:

- Ergonomic Design

- Light Weight with Instant Heating

- German Grade Non-Stick Coated Sole Plate

- Thermostat for Variable Temperature Control

Read more

View larger

View larger

View larger

Variable Temperature Control

Iron more efficiently with 1200 Watts of power and a convenient, easy-dial precision temperature control designed to monitor and maintain the temperature you choose.

Reaches into Tricky Areas

A curved, German grade non-stick coated sole plate glides smoothly over a variety of fabrics. An easy-to-use temperature control dial lets you quickly and accurately adjust the temperature to suit your fabric ensuring long life and peak performance.

Silk Braided, 180° Swivel Cord for Easy Movement

Enjoy easy, tangle-free ironing from any direction with a convenient 180° rotating power cord.

Read more

View larger

View larger

View larger

Shock Proof Plastic Body

The steam iron also has overheat safety protection variable steam control and adjustable thermostat control as an additional safety feature it is designed with shock proof plastic body to make your ironing a pleasant experience.

Power Indicator

The iron is also equipped with an indicator lamp which informs the user when the iron has reached the required or preset temperature and is ready to use.

German Grade Non-Stick Coated Sole Plate

Minimize the hassle of tugging, snagging and sticking while maximizing ironing efficiency with an ultra-smooth, non-stick, German grade non-stick coated sole plate. It’s specially design for faster, more convenient ironing on all fabrics.

Read more

About Us

Orpat is a group of companies based in the state of Gujarat, India with its wide national and international presence. The company is involved in manufacturing a wide range of well diversified products. Orpat, with its continuous endeavors to strive for high precision premium class products has developed a state of art manufacturing plant with its strong R&D team, continuously involved in achieving innovations for its products and process.
